attributes.action: Examine the probity of all persons involved in the decision to remove live free to air F1 coverage from the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
The probity of all persons involved in the decision to remove exclusive free to air coverage of Formula 1 from the BBC must be thoroughly examined to ensure that they acted in a responsible manner in line with their permitted authority, and that the views of the funders of the BBC service were properly represented.

In addition the exclusion of other TV  providers from the bidding process must be examined to ensure there is no abuse of process that has created a monopoly position in the market for live coverage of F1 in the UK.
